root: ^"Oh, what are you waiting here for?"
^The driver blinks. "To drive my client back, obviously."
^He's using the tone of voice that humans adopt when something is extremely obvious to them. It also implies the listener is stupid.
^He laughs. "Why d'you wanna leave anyway? Night's too young for that, the way you're dressed up."
^So this is a system of communal transportation? That must be why the cars look strange.
